metadata.title: NextPixel | Neo-Brutalist Digital Agency
metadata.description: Crafting digital brutalism for the elite brands of the future.
metadata.studioDescription: We architect digital excellence. NextPixel is a boutique digital architecture studio.

hero.taglineSuffix: FOR THE ELITE BRANDS OF THE FUTURE.

studio.description1: NextPixel is a young studio building next-generation websites. We combine cutting-edge technologies with minimalist design, turning every project into a digital work of art.
studio.description2: From complex web applications built with React and Next.js to rapid solutions on no-code platforms — we find the optimal approach for every client. Our goal is not just to create a website, but to build a digital product that drives your business forward.
studio.service1Desc: Building websites of any complexity — from landing pages to large-scale web applications. We use Next.js, React, and cutting-edge technologies.
studio.service2Desc: Rapid project launches on no-code platforms. Perfect for MVPs and startups looking to hit the market as fast as possible.
studio.service3Desc: UI/UX design that stands out. We create visually powerful interfaces focused on user experience and conversion.

footer.heading: Next Generation Digital.
footer.tagline: WE BUILD WHAT OTHERS FEAR TO IMAGINE.

team.polinaDesc: Architecting the unseen. Building the impossible. Mastery over design.
team.arturDesc: Architecting the unseen. Building the impossible. Mastery over code.
team.mishaDesc: Driving growth and forging partnerships. Turning vision into business reality.

studioPage.description: NextPixel is a boutique digital architecture studio. We dismantle mediocrity to rebuild high-performance digital ecosystems that command attention and drive conversion.
studioPage.footerText: Join the elite circle of digital architects.

careers.successMessage: Application received. We'll be in touch.
careers.securityNote: Encrypted transmission protocol active. By transmitting, you agree to our data processing architecture.
careers.errorUrl: Must start with http:// or https://

inquiry.successMessage: We'll review your inquiry and get back to you.

caseStudy.contentDescription: We built a dynamic ecosystem where data informs aesthetic. Lumina Tech required a platform that didn't just display information, but lived it.
caseStudy.technicalDescription: Utilizing Three.js and custom GLSL shaders, we achieved a fluid interface that reacts to user scroll velocity and cursor proximity.
